title: Snowdown Store
body: Is there any update on when the snowdown store will be available?

replies.body: Always happy to lead a hand. Let get those stores out before more topics appear.
OCE and EUW are up, other regions rolling out now.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=eVRiEPiR,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-16T23:33:16.372+0000)
>
> OCE and EUW are up, other regions rolling out now.

Any estimate on when NA will get up? I'm getting anxious 0.0

Copy pastaing straight from twitter:

SlayBelleKateyrina
‏@RiotKateyKhaos
[EUNE] Due to some issues, Your Snowdown Shop is currently disabled while we investigate.
Thank you! Ill make sure to look around next time
